questions.questionText: Choose the correct plural form of the word "child".
Which of the following is a noun?
What is the opposite of the word "ancient"?

theorySection.instructions: Answer all theory questions on your answer sheet.

questions.questionText:
a. Define the term "Values".
b. List three sources of values in the Nigerian society.
c. Explain the importance of integrity as a core value.
d. Differentiate between positive and negative values.

a. What is meant by "Constituted Authority"?
b. Identify four types of constituted authority in Nigeria.
c. Describe two functions of traditional rulers in modern governance.
d. Discuss three consequences of disobeying constituted authority.

a. Define "Citizenship".
b. Mention three ways an individual can become a citizen of Nigeria.
c. Highlight four duties of a Nigerian citizen.
d. Explain how a personâ€™s citizenship can be renounced or lost.

a. What is "Democracy"?
b. State four characteristics of a democratic government.
c. Distinguish between direct and indirect democracy.
d. Analyze three challenges facing democracy in Nigeria today.

a. Define the term "Rule of Law".
b. List the three main pillars of the rule of law according to A.V. Dicey.
c. Explain the importance of an independent judiciary to the rule of law.
d. Identify four factors that can limit the application of the rule of law.
